org.lafayette.server.webapp.api.resources

Class BaseResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.webapp.api.resources.BaseResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.jersey.api.model.AbstractResourceModelListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataServiceResource, IndexResource, ServiceResource, UserResource

    abstract class BaseResource
extends Object
implements com.sun.jersey.api.model.AbstractResourceModelListener
    Common functionality for all resource classes. TODO Write tests for this class.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
